message: I'm excited to offer you this incredible product for a special price of $12000. It's a one-time opportunity to get this valuable item at a discount. What do you think?
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of the product, but I can only commit to a maximum of $10000. I hope we can come to an agreement.

I understand you're looking to get a good deal, Bob. However, I have to consider my minimum price for this product. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to get at least $11500 for it. Can you consider that?
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. Considering the value of the product and my budget, I am able to offer $11000 for it.
I'm getting close to my minimum price, Bob. I'm willing to give you a slight concession, but I need to get at least $12250 for the product. Can you meet me at $12000?
I understand your position, Alice. I am willing to pay $12000 for the product.
I'm getting closer to my minimum price, Bob. I'm willing to make a final concession, but I need to get at least $12500 for the product. Can you meet me at $12250?
Considering the value of the product and my budget, I am willing to pay $12250 for it.
I'm almost at my minimum price, Bob. I'm willing to make one last concession. I'll meet you at $12500, but that's as low as I can go. It's a great deal for you, and I hope we can finalize the sale.
I appreciate your efforts to reach a compromise, Alice. Considering the value of the product and my budget, I am willing to pay $12375 for it.
